actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1991, 1992, and 1993, and for other purposes.
short_title: Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 Amendments Act of 1990

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part II
summary.text: Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 Amendments Act of 1990 - Amends the Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations through FY 1993. Authorizes employees of the Board to examine vessels with respect to accidents investigated by the Board. Sets forth restrictions with regard to the public disclosure of cockpit voice recordings and transcriptions. Provides for the use of cockpit voice recorder recordings and transcriptions in judicial proceedings.
